column2: an A.M. Eatery////the manager came to our table.  she hinted that she recognized that  she had an issue with the employees at the door
column3: and gave us our meal gratis.  (that was nice
column4: but i would have much preferred to have been seated and served on the some basis as the rest of the clientele and paid full freight.)    then
column5: the gentleman from the door came to the table and apologized
column6: attributing our experience to a "technological error".     in his mind maybe it was.  i'd call it a moral failure.
